description.narrative: Over 10,000 children affected by the armed conflict in the regions of Diffa and Tillaberi received assistance from UNICEF implementing partners and government child protection services. Sensitization campaigns on prevention of child abuse and risks were conducted through community based mechanisms and partners in the emergency sector. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of UNICEF-targeted girls and boys recruited and used by armed forces and groups that have been released and reintegrated with their families and provided with adequate care and services

percentage of UNICEF-targeted unaccompanied and separated girls and boys registered with family tracing and reunification services and family-based care or appropriate alternative services
